data.name: DefaultErrorTitle
data.comment: Default error title

data.name: InterestsTitle
data.comment: Title of page to change interests

data.name: DefaultErrorDismissButton
data.comment: Default button label for dismissing an error

data.name: NoLearnerError
data.value: There is no learner logged into the app
data.comment: Error message for when there is no current learner

data.name: StatementSendError
data.value: Unable to contact the LRS. Please contact your system administrator.
data.comment: Error message for when sending an xAPI statement fails.

data.name: OfflineMessageTitle
data.comment: Title for the message notifying the user they are offline

data.name: JsonErrorMessage
data.value: The server may be undergoing maintenance. Please try again in a few moments.
data.comment: Error message displayed to the user when there is a JSON parsing/serialization exception.

data.name: AuthenticationErrorMessage
data.value: Your account doesn't have permission to do that.
data.comment: Error message displayed to the user when the server returns a 401 or 403 status code.

data.name: ServerErrorMessage
data.value: There was a problem communicating with the server. The app will try again in a few moments.
data.comment: Error message displayed to the user when the server returns a 5xx error.

data.name: UnknownErrorMessage
data.value: Something has gone wrong on our side. The error has been logged so it can be addressed.
data.comment: Generic error message displayed to the user.

data.name: ActivityLaunchError
data.value: Unable to launch activity at this time.
data.comment: A message to indicate that activity launch failed.

data.name: DownloadError
data.value: Unable to download content at this time.
data.comment: A message to indicate that content downloading failed.

data.name: ShareError
data.value: Unable to share content at this time.
data.comment: A message to indicate that content sharing has failed.

data.name: TermsOfUseText
data.value: The PERLS software is the property of the U.S. Government and for Government use. This includes all data, materials; data/databases, files, graphics, broadcasts, photographs, software, codes, equipment, CD ROMs, and other deliverables provided by the Government or developed under this contract. Materials shall remain the property of the Government. PERLS software adheres to all export control regulations and ITAR compliance.
data.comment: The text corpus for the terms of use.
